info.name: YouTube - Hide Annotations
info.description: A quick, lightweight solution for people who generally don't want annotations but also don't want to install a whole new addon or give YouTube permission to remember who they are. (Easy to temporarily disable using the Stylish button menu on those rare occasions when you do want annotations.)
info.additionalInfo: 2016-11-13: Also hide the "teaser cards" in the top-right corner of some videos.
